Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:02.29]It was great at the very start
[00:07.06]Hands on each other
[00:10.51]Couldn't stand to be far apart
[00:14.54]Closer the better
[00:17.62]Now we're picking fights and slamming doors
[00:22.05]Magnifying all our flaws
[00:25.44]And I wonder why, wonder what for
[00:29.47]Why we keep coming back for more
[00:32.40]
[00:34.30]Is it just our bodies? 
[00:39.02]Are we both losing our minds?
[00:42.66]Is the only reason you're holding me tonight
[00:46.70]'Cause we're scared to be lonely?
[00:50.58]Do we need somebody just to feel like we're alright?
[00:57.35]Is the only reason you're holding me tonight
[01:01.88]'Cause we're scared to be lonely
[01:17.91]Scared to be lonely
[01:36.44]
[01:53.55]Too much time, losing track of us
[01:57.88]Where was the real?
[02:00.81]Undefined, spiraling out of touch
[02:05.14]Forgot how it feels
[02:07.89]All the messed up fights and slamming doors
[02:12.07]Magnifying all our flaws
[02:16.00]And I wonder why, wonder what for
[02:19.28]It's like we keep coming back for more
[02:22.82]
[02:24.92]Is it just our bodies? 
[02:28.90]Are we both losing our minds?
[02:32.98]Is the only reason you're holding me tonight
[02:37.01]'Cause we're scared to be lonely
[02:39.98]Do we need somebody just to feel like we're alright?
[02:47.67]Is the only reason you're holding me tonight
[02:52.30]'Cause we're scared to be lonely
[03:08.22]Scared to be lonely
